info.label: Senior Software Engineer
info.brief: Software engineer with strong experience in web technologies and JVM languages. Interests in 12 factor applications, devops, containerization and cloud technologies.

history.summary: Software developer on smartphone leasing plaform, including devops responsibilities.
highlights: Developed Identity Verification web application using React, AWS Lambda, Ruby and MySQL
Transitioned developer environment from Vagrant to Docker & Docker Compose
Improved CI pipelines and test suites for existing applications
Maintained and enhanced existing Ruby on Rails applications
Provisioned and configured AWS resources including networking, VPCs and API Gateway
Automated infrastructure tasks using Terraform, CloudFormation and Ansible

history.summary: Developed microservices for SaaS payments platform
highlights: Developed REST API services using Java 8, Play Framework and PostgreSQL
Refactored blocking code to be asynchronous using Completable Futures
Packaged and deployed applications using Docker and AWS Elastic Beanstalk
Wrote client libraries for consuming third-party services using Kotlin and OkHttp
Implemented per-customer workflows using JavaScript and Nashorn

history.summary: Developed microservices supporting personalized experiences in Kroger's mobile apps and websites
highlights: Developed microservices providing REST APIs using Java and Spring Boot
Built AOP plugin for collecting HTTP metrics in Spring
Participated in on-call rotation, utilizing tools including APM and log aggregation to diagnose production issues
Piloted Kotlin for backend development and evangelized within the organization
Developed data ingestion and processing pipeline using Kafka, Neo4j and Spring Boot services
Automated infrastructure tasks using Ansible
Migrated team from BitBucket and TeamCity to GitLab for project hosting and CI

history.summary: Developer on SaaS ERP software for small & medium businesses
highlights: Performed full-stack development on portal SPA using jQuery frontend and Java backend
Developed and maintained authentication and authorization functionality in Java backend
Planned and executed rewrite of backend, migrating from Java 5 and Apache Struts to Java 7, Spring and Apache Wicket
Built modern development infrastructure for team, including Jenkins CI and Git repository hosting
Automated common infrastructure tasks with Chef

history.title: B.S. Management
history.summary: B.S. in Management with minors in Economics and MIS
